Class DisplayPanel

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
EquationDisplayPanel
public class DisplayPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer

The DisplayPanel represents the panel of the Calculator containing the display panel for output.

Version:
2.2
Author:
Alan Ly

Serialized Form
